casebody.data:
Diana L. COLEY, Gerald L. Bass, John Walter Bryant, Ronald C. Dilthey, and all other Taxpayers Similarly Situated
v.
The STATE of North Carolina and Norris Tolson, Secretary of Revenue. No. 607A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2006. Philip R. Isley, G. Eugene Boyce, Raleigh, for Diana L. Coley, et al. Kay Linn Miller Hobart, Norma S. Harrell, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, for State of N.C. et al. Prior report: 360 N.C. 493 , 631 S.E.2d 121 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiffs on the 3rd day of August 2006 for rehearing of the decision of this Court pursuant to Rule 31, N.C. Rules of Appellate Procedure, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th day of August 2006."
